query:
ALTER TABLE membership_plans 
ADD COLUMN billingInterval INT DEFAULT 1 AFTER priceAmount,
ADD COLUMN billingAnchorDayOfWeek INT AFTER billingInterval,
ADD COLUMN termLengthUnits ENUM('months', 'weeks', 'days', 'visits') AFTER termLength,
ADD COLUMN termLengthValue INT AFTER termLengthUnits,
ADD COLUMN perVisitPrice INT AFTER termLengthValue,
ADD COLUMN visitPackSize INT AFTER perVisitPrice,
ADD COLUMN visitPackExpiryDays INT AFTER visitPackSize,
ADD COLUMN chargeOnAttendance INT DEFAULT 0 AFTER visitPackExpiryDays;
